intro_section.title:
Act I
The B360 Portal
intro_section.subtitle: A dream for customer experience and optimization of internal operations
intro_section.p:
We love working with organizations that are constantly thinking about how to improve their business to better serve their customers and make their employees' work more efficient.

And at Borgatta, particularly in the invisible aligner manufacturing service, they had dreamed of a platform that could solve a series of problems they were facing. This is an extremely complex process that involves challenges such as:

lessons.p: Constant communication between doctors and Borgatta's technical team
Transparency in the internal process to identify delays, errors, and those responsible for them
Identifying and anticipating errors in the files of over 2,600 doctors' patients who also manage multiple cases simultaneously
Constantly gathering information from the entire process to improve
Different billing and invoicing methods and schemes in 4 different countries

second_section.title:
Act II
How to accelerate digital transformation in a corporation?
second_section.p: For Borgatta, digital technology is not new, as the company is a pioneer in medical technology in Latin America. However, the step they wanted to take with the B360 Portal needed to ensure the reduction of:

aspects.title: Business risks
aspects.p: We talked to all areas of the business (clients, manufacturing, finance, marketing, and strategic management) that this new platform would impact to ensure we develop a tool that positively impacts each area of the company.

aspects.title: Usability risks
aspects.p: We designed prototypes and conducted exhaustive tests, both with doctors and the manufacturing team, to ensure we design a product that requires minimal thinking, naturally indicates the next step, and delivers results as quickly as possible.

aspects.title: Value risks
aspects.p: We validated in more than 50 user interviews where we heard from both doctors and Borgatta employees that the digital alternative we built was more efficient and user-friendly than what they were experiencing at that time.

aspects.title: Viability risks
aspects.p: Our team of software engineers validated step by step that we could build a platform capable of being developed with a reduced team, easy to maintain, and scalable in the long term according to Borgatta's objectives.

quote.quote:
We believe that our world is very complex to understand, and you understood our language and our vision.

More than an external and isolated agent, the experience has been one of teamwork with the best methodologies, which you bring to the table.
quote.name: Estefanía Mejía
quote.label: creative director, Borgatta

third_section.title:
Act III
And the results were exceptional
third_section.p: The platform completed its beta phase, and although we are convinced that many more achievements await us in the future, in its first few months, we accomplished the following:

results.subtitle: transparency
results.p: in Portal movements with full visibility on delays and conflicts

results.title: 4 countries
results.p: that can use the platform while respecting each location's operational preferences.

results.title: 50 cases
results.p: of treatments completed and managed by the new platform

results.subtitle: doctors
results.p: trained now have access to the platform.

results.subtitle: messages
results.p: (previously sent through multiple channels) centralized in the Portal.

results.title: $700k
results.subtitle: invoiced
results.p: automatically without the need to submit receipts or review account statements

quote.quote:
With this project, we took a step we wanted to take for a long time but had never achieved.

Acueducto is a company that adds value in all our areas and is now part of Borgatta.
quote.name: Cindy Borgatta
quote.label: CMO, Borgatta

fourth_section.title:
Act III
Now it's time to look once again towards the horizon
fourth_section.p:
Thanks to initiatives and ambition like this, Borgatta is one of the leaders in an industry as competitive as dental equipment manufacturing.

And now that they have brought to life a platform with so many functionalities that help both their customers and their operations team, Cindy and her team continue to do the same thing that brought them to this point: relentlessly seeking improvement and competitiveness.
